languages.text: "Любая победа Архиврага вносит смуту в мысли и сердце. Крепитесь, магос — для вас произошедшее особенно тяжело".
"Any victory for the Archenemy brings turmoil to mind and heart. Be strong, Magos — these events are especially trying for you."
languages.original_text: "Любая победа Архиврага вносит смуту в мысли и сердце. Крепитесь, магос — для вас произошедшее особенно тяжело".

traits.locale_text: "Any victory for the Archenemy brings turmoil to mind and heart. Be strong, Magos — these events are especially trying for you."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Any victory for the Archenemy brings turmoil to mind and heart. Be strong, Magos — these events are especially trying for you."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Any victory for the Archenemy brings turmoil to mind and heart. Be strong, Magos — these events are especially trying for you."

traits.locale_text: "Any victory for the Archenemy brings turmoil to mind and heart. Be strong, Magos — these events are especially trying for you."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “对抗混沌大敌的每场胜利，都伴随着思想与心智的错乱。坚强起来，贤者，我知道这样的事情对你而言尤为艰难。”
languages.original_text: "Any victory for the Archenemy brings turmoil to mind and heart. Be strong, Magos — these events are especially trying for you."

traits.locale_text: “对抗混沌大敌的每场胜利，都伴随着思想与心智的错乱。坚强起来，贤者，我知道这样的事情对你而言尤为艰难。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Qui ne serait pas tourmenté par une victoire du Grand Ennemi ? Je sais que ces événements vous touchent tout particulièrement, magos, mais soyez fort. »
languages.original_text: "Any victory for the Archenemy brings turmoil to mind and heart. Be strong, Magos — these events are especially trying for you."

traits.locale_text: « Qui ne serait pas tourmenté par une victoire du Grand Ennemi ? Je sais que ces événements vous touchent tout particulièrement, magos, mais soyez fort. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Cualquier victoria del Archienemigo causa dolor en la mente y el corazón. Valor, magos, estos sucesos son especialmente duros para usted».
languages.original_text: "Any victory for the Archenemy brings turmoil to mind and heart. Be strong, Magos — these events are especially trying for you."

traits.locale_text: «Cualquier victoria del Archienemigo causa dolor en la mente y el corazón. Valor, magos, estos sucesos son especialmente duros para usted».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「渾沌の勢力に勝利しても、心の動揺は避けられぬ。強くあれ、マゴスよ…こうしたできごとは、特にあなたには辛いものだろう」
languages.original_text: "Any victory for the Archenemy brings turmoil to mind and heart. Be strong, Magos — these events are especially trying for you."

traits.locale_text: 「渾沌の勢力に勝利しても、心の動揺は避けられぬ。強くあれ、マゴスよ…こうしたできごとは、特にあなたには辛いものだろう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Jeder Sieg für den Erzfeind löst Aufruhr in Verstand und Herz aus. Bleibt stark, Magos. Für Euch sind solche Ereignisse besonders schwer zu verarbeiten."
languages.original_text: "Any victory for the Archenemy brings turmoil to mind and heart. Be strong, Magos — these events are especially trying for you."

traits.locale_text: "Jeder Sieg für den Erzfeind löst Aufruhr in Verstand und Herz aus. Bleibt stark, Magos. Für Euch sind solche Ereignisse besonders schwer zu verarbeiten."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Any victory for the Archenemy brings turmoil to mind and heart. Be strong, Magos — these events are especially trying for you."

languages.text: "Şerbaşı'nın en ufak zaferi bile zihni ve kalbi telaşa düşürür. Güçlü olasın Magos. Bu hadiseler özellikle seni zorlayacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Any victory for the Archenemy brings turmoil to mind and heart. Be strong, Magos — these events are especially trying for you."
